author: Staff Reporter
text:
A gang posing as income tax officials robbed Ibrahim, a businessman, of Rs. 32 lakh in CMC Nagar in Padi on Monday. The gang took away cash and gold asking Ibrahim to collect it at the IT office after furnishing valid documents. Police filed a case and a search is on.

The gang posed as Income Tax officers investigators and robbed the businessman
title: Conmen rob man of Rs. 32 lakh
